title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk the eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the pancetta pan.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
In a pan, sauté the tikka masala paste and tomato puree.
Add the grilled chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in the cream and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: A simple and healthy breakfast option with mashed avocado on toasted bread.
